summary: A profile of homeless Romanian children who were born victims of the nation's reckless population growth policy during its communist era.
cast: Cristina Ionescu|Mihai Alexandre Tudose|Violeta 'Macarena' Rosu|Ana Turturica|Marian Turturica|Alexandru Beschina|Florin Ionut Calciu|Adrian Chiru|Romulus Cristescu|Ilie Fonfonile|Doru Grigore|Anca Hotnog|Claudia Luca|Angela Preda|Adrian Susanu|Cristina Tancau|Angela Taureci|Liliana Turturica|Ionut Tutea|Costel
title: Children Underground
